titles.title: Catoctin Mountain National Recreation Area Designation Act
A bill to designate Catoctin Mountain Park in the State of Maryland as the " Catoctin Mountain National Recreation Area", and for other purposes.
Catoctin Mountain National Recreation Area Designation Act
Catoctin Mountain National Recreation Area Designation Act
Catoctin Mountain National Recreation Area Designation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Star Print ordered on the bill.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-14.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 108-24.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 39.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the Senate on March 19, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Catoctin Mountain National Recreation Area Designation Act - Designates Catoctin Mountain Park in Maryland as the Catoctin Mountain National Recreation Area.Requires the Secretary of the Interior to administer the Recreation Area in a manner that protects and enhances its scenic, natural, cultural, historical, and recreational resources.Directs the Secretary to enter into a cooperative agreement with the Secretary of the Navy for the operation of the presidential retreat, Camp David, while preserving such site as part of the Recreation Area.Authorizes appropriations.
